movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief who steals secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state. He is given a chance at redemption by performing inception: planting an idea into a target’s mind. As he assembles his team, Cobb faces dangers that blur the line between dream and reality.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency. Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone, barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael, steps in to take care of the would-be killers.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a rising criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historical events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.overview: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy. Their concept catches on, with underground 'fight clubs' forming in every town, until potentially dangerous entries spiral out of control.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth. When he learns the shocking truth—that the world he knows is a simulated reality—he must fight for his life and the future of humanity.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.overview: All unemployed, Ki-taek's family takes peculiar interest in the wealthy and glamorous Parks for their livelihood until they get entangled in an unexpected incident. Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.overview: In Earth's future, a global crop blight and second Dust Bowl are slowly rendering the planet uninhabitable. Professor Brand, a brilliant NASA physicist, is working on plans to save mankind by transporting Earth's population to a new home via a wormhole. But first, Brand must send former NASA pilot Cooper on a daring mission.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.overview: A young girl, Chihiro, becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call upon the courage she never knew she had to free her family and return to the normal world.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.overview: Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor from Sauron's forces. Meanwhile, Frodo and Sam take the final steps of their quest to destroy the One Ring.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.overview: The true story of epithelial Oskar Schindler, a member of the Nazi party, womanizer, and war profiteer who saved the lives of more than 1,100 Jews during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.overview: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.overview: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives. The killer, known as 'John Doe', meticulously executes his gruesome plans, leaving a trail of elaborate crime scenes.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.overview: FBI trainee Clarice Starling seeks help from the manipulative, cannibalistic killer Dr. Hannibal Lecter to catch another serial killer, 'Buffalo Bill', who skins his victims.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery. He finds himself in the gladiator arenas, where his fame rises.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.overview: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose three brothers have been killed in action. Captain John Miller must lead his men on a perilous mission to find and return Private James Ryan.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.overview: A supernatural tale set on death row in a Southern prison, where gentle giant John Coffey exhibits a mysterious gift. Prison guard Paul Edgecomb witnesses these miraculous events and begins to question his beliefs.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.overview: The epic saga continues as Luke Skywalker, in hopes of defeating the evil Galactic Empire, learns the ways of the Jedi from aging master Yoda. But Darth Vader is more determined than ever to capture Luke. Meanwhile, rebel leader Princess Leia, Han Solo, Chewbacca, and the droids C-3PO and R2-D2 are thrown into various stages of capture, escape, and betrayal.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.overview: Eighties teenager Marty McFly is accidentally sent back in time to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean 'time machine' invented by his slightly mad scientist friend Doc Brown. He must make sure his high-school-age parents fall in love in order to save his own existence.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.overview: Under the direction of a ruthless instructor, a talented young drummer begins to pursue perfection at any cost. Andrew Neiman is an ambitious jazz student, single-minded in his pursuit of greatness, while Terence Fletcher is a conductor known for his terrifying teaching methods.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.overview: Struggling to find his place in the world while juggling school and family, Brooklyn teenager Miles Morales is bitten by a radioactive spider from another dimension. He soon discovers a hidden world where more than one person can wear the Spider-Man mask.
movies.director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman

movies.title: Joker
movies.overview: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure. Arthur Fleck's descent into madness brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.overview: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken, and everyone is fighting for the necessities of life. Within this world exist two rebels on the run who just might be able to restore order: Max, a man of action and of few words, and Furiosa, a woman of action who believes her path to survival may be achieved if she can make it across the desert back to her childhood homeland.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.overview: A mysterious story of two rival magicians in 19th-century London who battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other. Their rivalry escalates into a dangerous obsession, leading to tragic consequences.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner. Dr. King Schultz acquires Django and promises to free him upon capturing the Brittle brothers, leading them on a mission across the South.

movies.title: Alien
movies.overview: During its return to Earth, the commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant moon. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs, one of them is attacked by a mysterious life form, and they soon realize that its life cycle has just begun.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.overview: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same evening.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.overview: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

movies.title: Dune
movies.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence—a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential—only those who can conquer their fear will survive.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.overview: Jack Torrance becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. He settles in with his wife, Wendy, and his son, Danny, who is plagued by psychic premonitions. As Jack's writing goes nowhere and Danny's visions become more disturbing, Jack discovers the hotel's dark secrets and begins to unravel into a homicidal maniac.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.overview: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life. After solving a difficult graduate-level math problem, his talents are discovered by Professor Gerald Lambeau, who decides to help the misguided youth.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.overview: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe. As Thanos collects the Infinity Stones, the fate of Earth and existence itself has never been more uncertain.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Coco
movies.overview: Despite his family’s baffling generations-old ban on music, Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself magically transported to the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead. Along the way, he meets charming trickster Hector, and together, they set off on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel's family history.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.overview: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Ainu tribe, is cursed by a demon god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, the Princess Mononoke, a young woman raised by wolves who will do anything to protect her forest home from the humans of Iron Town.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.overview: A couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories. But as his memories of her are systematically erased, Joel discovers that he still loves Clementine and must fight to hold onto their past.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.overview: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb. The film follows him as he navigates the political and moral complexities of the Manhattan Project during World War II.

movies.title: Amélie
movies.overview: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love. She secretly orchestrates the lives of those around her, creating a world of her own design.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.overview: Llewelyn Moss stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and $2 million in cash. He takes the money, setting off a catastrophic chain of violence that not even the law, in the person of aging, disillusioned Sheriff Bell, can contain. He is pursued by the relentless, enigmatic killer Anton Chigurh.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.overview: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend. The story involves the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting and the battle for an enormous family fortune.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.overview: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg, the T-1000. The two terminators battle it out to determine the fate of humanity.

movies.title: Cinema Paradiso
movies.overview: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist. The film explores his life, his love for cinema, and his eventual departure from his Sicilian hometown.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.overview: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is suddenly released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days. He soon discovers he is trapped in a web of conspiracy and violence, and his quest for vengeance becomes a journey of shocking self-discovery.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.overview: To take down South Boston's Irish Mafia, the police send in one of their own to infiltrate the neighborhood gang. At the same time, the mob has planted their own mole within the police department. As both men rise through the ranks, they are plunged into a dangerous game of cat and mouse.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.overview: A group of strangers is assembled to pull off the perfect diamond heist. When the simple robbery goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant. Holed up in a warehouse, they must figure out who the rat is.

movies.title: American History X
movies.overview: A former neo-Nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did. After being released from prison, Derek Vinyard must confront his past and save his brother Danny from the cycle of violence and hate.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.overview: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother. Her disappearance sparks an investigation that uncovers the motel's dark secrets.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.overview: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts of his past and navigate the changing landscape of organized crime in America.
